column1: Box table 1: Total incarcerated population at yearend 2006
Author(s): William J. Sabol, Heather Couture, and Paige M. Harrison
Box table 1.Total incarcerated population at yearend 2006
Note: Data are based on custody counts.  See Appendix tables 11 and 12 for custody counts in U.S. Territories and Commonwealths.
a/Excludes State and Federal prisoners housed in local jails.
b/As of June 30 of each year.

d/Counts are form the Census of Juveniles in Residential Placement (CJRP), conducted by Office of Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention.  The 2005 counts if for October 22, 2003; for 2006, the count is as of March 29, 2006.
